profile_data.summary:
üöÄ Machine Learning Engineer | GCP & Azure Expert | 5+ Years of Experience

üîπ About Me:
Passionate about leveraging data-driven solutions to tackle complex problems and drive business growth. I am a seasoned Machine Learning Engineer with hands-on experience in developing and deploying machine learning models on both Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Microsoft Azure.

üî∏ Experience:
üëâ 3.5 years of hands-on experience in the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence.
üëâ Expertise in designing, training, and deploying machine learning models for various applications.
üëâ Proficient in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn.
üëâ Experienced in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model optimization.
üëâ Skilled in working with structured and unstructured data, including text and image data.
üëâ Strong background in statistical analysis and data visualization.

üîπ GCP & Azure Proficiency:
üëâ Extensive experience in utilizing GCP services, such as BigQuery, AI Platform, and AutoML, to build scalable ML solutions.
üëâ Proficient in Azure Machine Learning, Azure Databricks, and Azure Cognitive Services.
üëâ Expertise in cloud-based model deployment and management.

üî∏ Achievements:
üèÜ Successfully implemented ML solutions that improved operational efficiency and enhanced decision-making for organizations.
üèÜ Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate business problems into machine learning solutions.

üîπ Education:
üéì Master's Degree in Artificial Intelligence at San Jose State University | 2025
üéì Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at VR Siddhartha Engineering College  | 2019

üîπ Open to Collaborations:
I'm open to exciting opportunities, collaborations, and networking within the field of machine learning and AI. Let's connect and explore how we can work together to drive innovation and solve challenging problems.

Feel free to reach out to me at tharunsaiagaram1998@gmail.com

#MachineLearning #AI #GCP #Azure #DataScience #ArtificialIntelligence #MLEngineering
profile_data.headline: Sr. AI/ML Engineer | Ex-Samsung Research America | Actively looking for Full Time Opportunities 2025 | 5+ Years of ML Experience | LLMS | MLOPS | GPU‚Äôs Scaling

experience.description:
‚óè Developed and maintained LLM applications for voice models in Bixby AI, optimizing performance and deployment strategies. Dockerized LLM training applications, enhancing operational efficiency in fine-tuning Gaussian models and deploying inference on TensorRT LLM servers, VLLM, and TGI.
‚óè Designed and implemented MLOps processes for the Samsung NLP team, benefiting 10-15 data science teams by
streamlining workflows and improving collaboration.
‚óè Deployed Kubeflow on Kubernetes, creating end-to-end training and inference pipelines using the Kubeflow Pipelines
SDK, enabling data scientists to initiate jobs via a user-friendly interface.
‚óè Addressed key challenges, including coordination between data scientists, GPU resource contention, and environmental inconsistencies on GCP, significantly improving job execution reliability.
‚óè Achieved workload scaling across multiple nodes in a GKE cluster, resulting in substantial cost savings by optimizing resource utilization and reducing dependency on high-cost Nvidia H100 GPUs.
experience.title: Machine Learning Intern

experience.description:
‚óè Led design, development, and deployment of end-to-end MLOps solutions on Microsoft Azure, utilizing Azure Databricks and Azure Data Factory for seamless data preparation and model integration.
‚óè Collaborated closely with 10+ data scientists, data engineers and business stakeholders to understand project requirements and establish scalable MLOPS workflows.
‚óè Created and managed multiple Azure Databricks clusters to process and transform large-scale data efficiently for
Machine Learning projects.
‚óè Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Azure Data Factory, automating data preparation and model training processes or improved efficiency and reduced time-to-market.
experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer

experience.description:
‚óè Designed and implemented end-to-end MLOps solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP) for seamless deployment
and management of machine learning models.
‚óè Established MLOps template streamlines deployment of machine learning models to production within Google Cloud
Platform for data scientists. Template has led to a 70% reduction in time required for data scientists to develop
models, as it simplifies the process of transitioning models to the production environment.
‚óè MLOPS template involves following stages: CI/CD pipelines for Automation, ML testing, Building Docker Images ,
Creating Training and Prediction Pipeline, Deploying Training and Prediction pipeline in Batch and Real time mode.
experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer

experience.description:
‚óè Analyzed and developed logic for 35 Dashboard KPI's leveraging Big query SQL and generated data for 3 periods MTD, YTD and R12 using Big query Procedural Language . Automated process by leveraging Airflow to run every
month automatically based on schedule.
‚óè Developed 6 dashboards for Reporting using Data studio to al low clients to track key metrics from Big query to aid
decision making.
‚óè Automated ETL process across a high volume of data reduces manual workload by 25% annually.
experience.title: Data Scientist

member.occupation: Sr. AI/ML Engineer | Ex-Samsung Research America | Actively looking for Full Time Opportunities 2025 | 5+ Years of ML Experience | LLMS | MLOPS | GPU‚Äôs Scaling

projects.description: This model classifies an image and tags with corresponding labels based on the fashion items and clothing (around 228 labels) present in an image. This technique helps fashion designers to know what combinations of products frequently used by people and can even detect most occurring objects in the given data. Worked with Resnet50 for classification and Faster RCNN for detection using Tensorflow Object Detection API.
projects.title: Automatic Detection of Fashion and Clothing items ( Resnet50 + Multi Label + Faster RCNN )

projects.description: Detecting People who smoke in restricted places(Non-Smoking Areas) and inform to corresponding officials. Implemented the YOLO algorithm using Darknet. Created dataset by self annotating images using Yolo_Mark tool and trained the model on Nvidia p4000.
projects.title: People smoking in restricted places(Object-Detection)

projects.title: Speech Recognition using Tensorflow(Audio-Intelligence)

projects.description: Multi-label classification task which involves 4 classes i.e toxic, threat, obscene,identity-hate. Built a model using LSTM Units and achieved an accuracy of 80% on the test data. Even used several pre-trained embeddings such as word2vec, BERT, and Universal Sentence encoder to increase the accuracy.
projects.title: Classifying Toxic comments based on their Intensity(Multi-Label-NLP)

projects.description: Pneumonia is an infection that inflames your lungs‚Äô air sacs. I built a Convolutional Neural Network model from scratch which classifies the chest Xrays of humans into either effected with Pneumonia or not. Achieved an accuracy of 82% with precision 81% and recall 80%.
projects.title: Pneumonia disease detection by using Chest xrays(Image-Classification)

projects.title: Automatic detection of Diabetic Retinopathy using Retinal Images(Health-Care-CV)

projects.description: Detecting the base price of a player by using several attributes i.e for batsmen number of runs, average, strike rate, Age, Capped/Uncapped, foreigner/Indian, etc. Implemented Decision tree classifier from scikit learn. Worked with pandas,numpy,scikit-learn, and pickle.
projects.title: IPL players base price predictor by using Decision Tree classifier(ML Task)

Identified patterns in the crime occurring and forecasted the possibility of crime for the next 5 years. Have worked with pandas,matplotlib,numpy, and Fbprophet Library.
